A team member keeps misunderstanding tasks. How can I listen better to clarify things?
Use reflective listening—repeat back their understanding of the task and clarify any discrepancies before they proceed.

Sometimes I struggle to remember instructions when there's a lot going on. Any tips?
Break instructions into smaller steps, use mnemonic devices, or write down key points immediately after hearing them.
